com.pdai.javafx.app.utils

Class ExceptionWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.PrintWriter
        • com.pdai.javafx.app.utils.ExceptionWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ExceptionWriter
extends java.io.PrintWriter
    ExceptionWriter is a PrintWriter that can be used to get a stacktrace as a string.
